root.name: Warrior Epic
root.description: On November 12, 2010, ijji.com announced that "Warrior Epic will no longer be serviced through ijji.com" and was removed from their ijji REACTOR game launcher. No mention of the new service carrier was mentioned. Prior to the announcement of the termination of service, sections of the Warrior Epic website were non-functional, ijji REACTOR would fail to launch the game, and the ijji helpdesk provided no explanations. A reward system is in place to compensate players who played Warrior Epic on ijji and bought items with real-life money.
